ygData.subject: RE: Questions about the Water Crystal Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I have steins for both my characters. I had two other friends an enchanter and a ranger start collecting material at the beginning of last week. We
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I have steins for both my characters. I had two other friends an
enchanter and a ranger start collecting material at the beginning of last
week. We proceeded to do the quest several times and sold 13 steins before
we were done. By Friday of last week you couldn't give a stein away. Just
glad we got in on the ground floor. We have things we wouldn't expect to see
for another 10 or 15 levels.

I know it may be an exploit and that some people may feel we cheapened the
quest but, trading is a part of the game and the only way to trade up is to
have something a higher level character wants and doesn't know how or where
to get it. Of course after the quest was posted that all changed, the
beauty of the internet.

People do say at higher levels a weapon will no longer be needed and you
rely on your spells and mana. I however it will make me feel better knowing
I have a weapon with me that one time I really need it.


Aljernon
24th Level Wizard

Drahkoth
8th Level Necromancer

-----Original Message-----
From: Naeeldar [mailto:jackal@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 3:47 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Questions about the Water Crystal Staff


From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>

Heh I hope you can get another glowing stein because I'm currently Level 34
and I don't even carry a weapon anymore except for my Stilleto of the
BloodClaw which I'm currently trying to sell. That intell from the stein is
so important, the staff while good is not very useful since you never melee
anymore it just doesn't happen. Anyway thought I'd throw in my 2 cents.

Naeeldar K'Valle Dark Elf Necromancer
